subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The return of Josh Wolff, 31, a striker who has scored 64 goals in 10 M.L.S. seasons, cannot come soon enough for the Kansas City Wizards.
snippet: The return of Josh Wolff, 31, a striker who has scored 64 goals in 10 M.L.S. seasons, cannot come soon enough for the Kansas City Wizards.
